decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing landfall triggers to quickly build up a strong board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures. By consistently playing additional lands and triggering landfall abilities, the deck aims to deal damage early and often, while also utilizing powerful equipment to further enhance its creatures' abilities. The Boros colors provide a balance of aggression and control, allowing the deck to apply pressure while also dealing with threats from the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Stoneforge Mystic adds versatility and further enhances the deck's aggro strategy.

The main idea of this Aggro deck is to overwhelm your opponent with a quick and aggressive strategy, utilizing low-cost creatures like Memnite, Ornithopter, and Signal Pest to quickly build a board presence. The deck also includes a strong Goblin theme with cards like Goblin Bushwhacker, Goblin Guide, and Goblin Wardriver to pump up your creatures and deal damage efficiently. The deck includes key cards like Kuldotha Rebirth and Devastating Summons to flood the board with tokens and finish off opponents quickly. The inclusion of Mox Opal and Contested War Zone help ramp up your aggression and close out games swiftly.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Lotus Cobra and Overgrown Battlements, while also utilizing cards like Harrow and Explore to search for additional lands. The main win condition is to ramp up to Primeval Titan and Avenger of Zendikar, creating a massive army of plant tokens. Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle acts as a backup win condition, dealing damage to the opponent for each Mountain that enters the battlefield. The deck aims to control the board through ramp and landfall triggers, overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and direct damage.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive vampire creatures and efficient removal spells. By playing low-cost creatures like Bloodghast and Vampire Lacerator, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain board control with cards like Gatekeeper of Malakir and Kalastria Highborn. The inclusion of versatile removal spells like Go for the Throat and Lightning Bolt helps to deal with threats from the opponent. The deck also utilizes Dark Tutelage for card advantage and Viscera Seer for sacrifice synergy. Overall, the strategy is to be proactive and maintain a strong board presence throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal, and hand disruption to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on maintaining card advantage with draw spells like Jace's Ingenuity and Jace, the Mind Sculptor, while also utilizing powerful win conditions like Grave Titan and Creeping Tar Pit. By utilizing a mix of control elements and powerful threats, this deck aims to outlast and outmaneuver the opponent to ultimately secure victory.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to play powerful landfall effects and control the game by dealing damage to opponents' creatures or directly to their life total with Valakut triggers. It uses cards like Primeval Titan and Avenger of Zendikar to quickly put lands into play, while also utilizing cards like Harrow and Cultivate to accelerate land drops. The goal is to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and burn spells while staying ahead on resources and controlling the board state.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by ramping up its mana quickly to drop big threats such as Avenger of Zendikar and Primeval Titan. The deck also utilizes Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to deal direct damage to the opponent as additional win condition. It includes cards like Harrow, Cultivate, and Explore to accelerate land drops and thin out the deck for better draws. It also includes some removal spells like Pyroclasm and Slagstorm to deal with opposing threats. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and direct damage from Valakut.

The focus of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, removal, and card advantage provided by Jace, the Mind Sculptor. The deck aims to stall the opponent's threats with removal and counter spells while generating card advantage and eventually winning the game with planeswalkers like Elspeth Tirel and Gideon Jura. The deck utilizes powerful control cards like Mana Leak, Day of Judgment, and Preordain to manipulate the game and keep the opponent at bay, ultimately out-valuing and out-lasting them in the late game.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence by consistently playing landfall creatures and equipping them with powerful weapons such as swords. Utilizing aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Plated Geopede, as well as efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Journey to Nowhere, the strategy focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently. By utilizing the landfall mechanic and equipment synergies, this Aggro Boros Landfall deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of speed and power.

The deck focuses on quickly building a strong board presence by utilizing mana acceleration and powerful creatures in the Selesnya color combination. By ramping up mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Lotus Cobra, the deck aims to quickly play threats like Leatherback Baloth and Mirran Crusader. Additionally, by using cards like Fauna Shaman to tutor for specific creatures and Eldrazi Monument to protect them, the deck can overwhelm opponents with aggressive and efficient plays. The deck combines both creature aggression and resilience to create a fast and formidable strategy.

The main idea of this deck is to swarm the board with cheap creatures like Memnite, Ornithopter, and Signal Pest, while utilizing cards like Goblin Bushwhacker and Kuldotha Rebirth to increase the pressure on the opponent. Cards like Devastating Summons and Chimeric Mass allow for explosive plays to finish off the opponent quickly. The deck aims to be fast and aggressive, utilizing the artifact synergy with Mox Opal and Chimeric Mass to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Lightning Bolt and Contested War Zone provide additional reach and damage potential.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent through aggressive and efficient creatures like Goblin Guide and Kargan Dragonlord, backed up by direct burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Burst Lightning. The inclusion of cards like Slagstorm and Teetering Peaks helps ensure that the pressure is maintained on the opponent. The deck aims to win the game quickly by overwhelming the opponent with early aggression and efficient removal spells, making it difficult for the opponent to stabilize and turn the game around.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by disrupting opponent's strategies through counterspells and hand disruption while generating advantage with powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor. It aims to slow down the game and create a board presence with threats like Grave Titan and Vampire Nighthawk, while also controlling the opponent's mana base with cards like Spreading Seas and Tectonic Edge. The deck seeks to outvalue the opponent in the long game and grind out incremental advantages to secure victory.

The primary strategy of this deck is to control the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive creatures. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by countering key spells, removing threats, and generating card advantage through card draw. It also utilizes land destruction and creature recursion to maintain control over the battlefield. The win condition is to eventually overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Grave Titan and Vampire Nighthawk. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win the game through efficient resource management and strategic control.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana through cards like Overgrown Battlement and Cultivate, while ramping out powerful creatures like Primeval Titan and Avenger of Zendikar. The deck aims to use Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle as a win condition by getting multiple Mountain cards onto the battlefield to deal damage to the opponent's creatures and eventually to their face. Cards like Harrow and Explore help to thin out the deck and find key pieces while Lightning Bolt and Pyroclasm provide removal and board control.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana and using landfall triggers to deal damage with Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle. The deck aims to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Oracle of Mul Daya and Primeval Titan, while also using cards like Harrow and Khalni Heart Expedition to trigger Valakut's ability multiple times in a turn. By controlling the board with cards like Obstinate Baloth and Avenger of Zendikar, the deck can overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and burn spells.
